title: Any DRC may be utilised on one or more plots or lands whether vacant, or already developed fully or
clause_text: Any DRC may be utilised on one or more plots or lands whether vacant, or already developed fully or partly by erection of additional storeys, or in any other manner consistent with these Regulations,

source_pdf.text_snippet: Any DRC may be utilised on one or more plots or lands whether vacant, or already developed fully or partly by erection of additional storeys, or in any other manner consistent with these Regulations,
